Uses of Interface
com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.publishing.EventSubscribable

  • Packages that use EventSubscribable 
    Package Description
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.publishing
    Provides the EventPublisher interface, representing an object that published Events to subscribers, and the EventSubscribable interface, which represents an object that event handlers can subscribe to.
    com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.dispatching  

    • Uses of EventSubscribable in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.publishing

      Classes in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.publishing that implement EventSubscribable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SubscribableEventPublisher
      An EventPublisher that publishes events to handlers subscribed via the EventSubscribable interface.
      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.publishing that return EventSubscribable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventSubscribable EventSubscribable.subscribe(EventType eventType, java.util.function.Consumer<Event> handler)
      Register a handler to handle Events of the given EventType.

    • Uses of EventSubscribable in com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.dispatching

      Methods in com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.dispatching with parameters of type EventSubscribable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DispatchingEventOutChannel.subscribeTo(EventSubscribable eventPublisher) 
      static DispatchingSubscriber DispatchingSubscriber.subscribingTo(EventSubscribable eventPublisher)
      Create a DispatchingSubscriber that subscribes handler instances to the supplied EventSubscribable event publisher.
